mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_003 (notice_proper_num, notice_title, notice_content, admin_proper_num) select coalesce ((select max(notice_proper_num)+1 from TB_003 where cast(substring(notice_proper_num, 1, 6) as date) = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%y%m%d')) , concat(DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%y%m%d'), '00001') ), #{notice_title}, #{notice_content}, #{admin_proper_num}
mapper.select: select notice_proper_num from TB_003 where admin_proper_num = #{admin_proper_num} order by notice_proper_num desc limit 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_016 (file_path, notice_file_uuid, original_file_name, notice_proper_num) VALUES (#{file_path}, #{notice_file_uuid}, #{original_file_name}, #{notice_proper_num})
mapper.select:
select *, CONVERT(NOTICE_DATE, CHAR) AS NOTICE_DATE_as_varchar from TB_003
where 1=1
and NOTICE_TITLE like concat('%',#{cri.searchNotice},'%')
order by notice_proper_num desc limit #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.amount}

select count(*) as total from TB_003 where 1=1
and NOTICE_TITLE like concat('%',#{cri.searchNotice},'%')
